mapper.select: SELECT M_ARTIST.ARTIST_NAME_KJ ,M_ARTIST.ARTIST_NAME_KN ,M_PRODUCT.PROD_NAME ,M_PRODUCT.CATEGORY_DIV ,M_PRODUCT.PROD_NAME ,M_PRODUCT.SALES_START_DATE ,M_PRODUCT.DISP_PRICE ,M_PRODUCT.IMG_PATH FROM ( SELECT CATEGORY_DIV ,PROD_NAME ,ARTIST_CD ,SALES_START_DATE ,DISP_PRICE ,IMG_PATH FROM yohh.M_PRODUCT WHERE CATEGORY_DIV=#{categoryDiv} ) AS M_PRODUCT INNER JOIN yohh.M_ARTIST ON M_PRODUCT.ARTIST_CD =M_ARTIST.ARTIST_CD
